g4p.tool.gui.tabview

Class ScrollControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • g4p.tool.gui.tabview.ScrollControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScrollAreaUser, TGuiConstants, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ScrollControl
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements IScrollAreaUser, TGuiConstants
    GUI control encapsulating a ScrollableArea object. The actual scrollable display must be created from a class that inherits from ScrollableArea.
    Author:
    Peter Lager
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
